title: MERN Stack Developer
description:
- Assisted in the development and maintenance of web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).
- Gained hands-on experience developing RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
- Contributed to building responsive user interfaces with React.js.
- Worked with MongoDB for database operations and schema design.
- Collaborated with the team using Git for version control and participated in agile development processes.

title: MERN Stack Developer
description:
- Developing and enhancing features for the Fairchance CRM platform using the MERN stack.
- Designing, building, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable server-side logic with Node.js and Express.js.
- Implementing user-facing features and components using React.js, ensuring responsiveness and performance.
- Managing database interactions and schema design with MongoDB.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams (product, design) to define and ship new features.
- Writing tests and participating in code reviews to maintain code quality.
